attributes.action: Sort out the Working tax and child tax benifits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The working tax and child tax systems are not working! Sort them out so that us familys on or below the "poverty line" can actually afford to live. Simple.
My story breifly, i work 50hrs a week, get paid £16000 pa, my income plus wifes part time income plus credits dont pay the bills! We have no money left over to be able to live comfortably, WE HAVE NO LIFE! All we do is get up go to work, come home, eat, go to sleep. Cant afford to go out as a family and we dont have any luxories i.e sky tv ect.

So come on and do something about it
